title: West Elm Advertisement Font
author: lindzaymiller

comments.content: Please remove spaces from the filename.

Top: **[Sentinel (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418010725/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Sentinel%20-%20Medium&fid=a1d65c5b1d1547a34e3e54f964d8f4cd&fsize=48&text=At%20west%20elm%2C%20we're%20committed%20to%20people%20-%20not%20just%20products.&wrap=2)** by Hoefler&Co [2004]

Bottom: **[Ultramagnetic (Light)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418010725/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=You-Work-For-Them%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Ultramagnetic%20-%20Light&fid=0ff8caf2489f5f54873e6f8ed64ce26d&fsize=60&text=READ%20OUR%20STORY&wrap=2)** [You Work For Them, 2002]
